SELECT b.board_pk, b.title, b.file, t.dept, b.date, u.name FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user = u.user_pk JOIN team t ON t.team_pk = u.team JOIN department d ON d.dept_pk = t.dept
WHERE d.description = '%${map.text}%'

SELECT b.board_pk, b.title, b.file, t.dept, b.date, u.name FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user = u.user_pk JOIN team t ON t.team_pk = u.team JOIN department d ON d.dept_pk = t.dept
JOIN file f ON b.file = f.pk JOIN rank r ON t.rank = r.pk JOIN hashtag:table h ON b.hashtagList = h.pk
and d.description = '%${text}%'
and u.name = ${text}
and b.title like '%${text}%'
and b.content like '%${text}%'
and b.date between DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL ${date} MONTH) and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
and f.file_title like '%${file}%'
and r.description = ${rank}
and h.hashtagList like '%${var}%'

SELECT b.title, b.file, f.file_title, d.description, r.description, b.date, u.name, h.hashtagList, u.starMark FROM board b JOIN file f on f.pk = b.file JOIN user u on u.pk = b.user JOIN hashtag:table h on h.pk = b.hashtagList JOIN team t on t.pk = u.team JOIN rank r on r.pk = t.rank JOIN department d on d.pk = t.dept WHERE b.pk = ${board_pk}
